content.rendered: 2 inch thermal panel printer is specially design for industrial robust application. It is having multiple character size with the speed up-to 50mm/sec. All the universal ESC/POS command support with text and graphics printing. With over temperature protection and paper out detection. It has also Fault Led indication. Large buffer size for data to be print. RS232 communication protocol support with 9600 baud rate.

excerpt.rendered:
• Thermal Dot Line Printing
  • High Printing Speed
  • Easy Paper Loading
  • Communication Protocol RS 232
  • Low Power Consumption
